channel.title: String to byte array and back?
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone knows how to convert a String to a byte array and then back. I've tried looking on google, and can't seem to find anything.
Thanks, Justin

item.source: String to byte array and back?

item.title: String to byte array and back?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

To byte array: someString.getBytes()
Back to String: new String(theByteArray)

E.g
String someString = “lerl”;
byte[] bytes = someString.getBytes();
String newString = new String(bytes);

Read full topic
